thread.title: Jump For Joy: New Jump In Trampoline Arena Offers Free Tickets to VIP Party

author: cbs8
title: Jump For Joy: New Jump In Trampoline Arena Offers Free Tickets to VIP Party
text:
Jump In Trampoline Arena
SLOUGH, England , September 18,
On 11 October 2015 something exciting is happening in Slough - Jump In, one of Europe's biggest, newest and most innovative trampoline parks will be hosting an exclusive VIP launch party. The invite-only event will include food, top-notch entertainment, plenty of bouncing, and a few more surprises, too, all free to guests.
To put their name in the prize draw hat, entrants need only visit the Jump In website and click for the chance to win https://www.gojumpin.com/ .
Trampolining has grown in popularity in the UK in recent years - it's great fun and really good for you, burning as many calories as running. Although you might have trampolined before, the likelihood is that you've never done it quite like this!
The new Jump In arena offers 3D Dodgeball, a Kid Zone, Foam Pits, tumble tracks and a huge main court where people can jump freely between interconnected trampolines and literally bounce off the walls. Fancy trying to defy gravity? This is a great place to start! And if you're not sure how to develop a jumping style, live trampoline comedy acts will be performing at the launch to show you exactly how NOT to do it!
Jump In is open to all ages, although under 18s will need parental consent and the under 5s will require parental supervision. It is clean, safe, and exhilarating, giving families a chance to have fun and get fit together. And when you've done enough jumping around, you can recoup your energy in the fabulous on-site caf√©, filled with local produce, gourmet ice-cream, handmade cakes, hand-roasted coffee and more.
Jump In just opened to the public on 10 September 2015 .
https://www.gojumpin.com/
About Jump In:
Address: 550 Dundee Road, Slough SL1 4LE
Grand Opening: 10th September 2015 . Local government and community leaders as well as Facebook and Twitter competition winners will be invited to attend the VIP event.
Bookings: Individuals will be able to make bookings in July on the website: http://gojumpin.com
About the founders: JumpIn has been set up by a mumpreneur and two dadpreneurs who themselves are fun loving and adventuresome, always looking for activities to share with their children. Founders Linsey Willaford-West and Vernon West were visiting family in Fort Worth Texas when they came across Altitude Trampoline Park. They brought their toddler to the park and had so much fun that they came back nearly every day of the remainder of their trip! When they came back to the UK, they didn't want the fun to stop and knew they had to bring the concept to their local neighbourhood. They reached out to Gavin Lucas to co-found and head up the organisation. Gavin was happily heading up a large division of DHL at the time, but was compelled by the unique opportunity as he was always passionate about sports and a fellow parent and could see trampoline parks transforming the way Brits get fit and play.
Jump In is powered by Altitude Trampoline Parks , which is a leading international operator with multiple sites across the US as well as park development in Japan , UAE, South Africa and India .
